rules_text: At the beginning of each end step, if you've committed a crime this turn, create a token that's a copy of Mischievous Mob. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“If you keep being such an unruly kid, the imps will come to you at night.”
—Village Elder[/i]
